text: Johanan men aku Isipɨn mangasava ami. Ezɨ me fo, Ismael Gedalia mɨsoghezɨ an areme, gumazir kam Babilonɨn atrivim Judan nguazim gativagh an ganasa anemɨsefe. Egha me atiatia nɨghnɨsi, Kaldiaba ti men otivizir biziba baregham, egh izɨ me gasɨghasigham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me Isipɨn mangasa ifonge. Egha me Betlehemɨn nguibamɨn boroghɨra, Gerut Kimhamɨn nguibamɨn otivigha iti.
